Title: The Red Throne
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Somvilay Xayaphone, Seo Jung Kim, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Jeremy Shada, Jessica DiCicco, Keith David, Dee Bradley Baker
Plot: The Fire King and Don John the Flame Lord take over the Fire Kingdom. Now Flame Princess must use Finn's and Cinnamon Bun's help to get it back.
